Description:
A Land of Realised Dreams!
Positioned within a quiet street, walking distance to schools, shops and transport, this three bedroom brick home sits on 861sqm (approx) and is a notable offer to first home buyers, investors, families and the home handyman. Well maintained and full of foliage, the homes facade is made particularly pretty with a cosy front verandah, the perfect position to sit and enjoy a morning coffee while taking in the quiet surrounds. Inside, a welcoming entrance leads to a lounge and dining room with timber floors and lovely windows and then a neat and tidy kitchen featuring wood paneled walls and shelving, with views of the substantial rear yard. Boasting a light-filled interior, this charming home also comprises a large family/rumpus room, good-sized robed bedrooms, plus a giant family bathroom ensuring that this package offers the space to live comfortably. Stepping off the back porch, the enormous rear yard delivers a split level layout, plenty of room for a veggie patch in one corner, a spot for the swing set, a landing for the trampoline, or loads of room to extend the current residence and create a whole new oasis! Add in gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, ceiling fans throughout, a sizable laundry, sound fencing, double garage and extra off street parking and this property is full of potential and the promise of a dream opportunity realised! Book your inspection today!
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Wield This Battleaxe
Serene birdsong, leafy vistas and the convenience of easy to reach amenities – does it get any better than this?
Yes it does! If you’ve been searching for a place to bring your dream home to life (subject to council approval), then you’ve found your calling with this spacious 595SQM (approximately) battleaxe block of land.
With Croydon South Primary School, Tintern Girls Grammar School, Tinternvale Primary School and Eastfield Park all close by, this alluring allotment is also minutes from Eastland, Ringwood and Ringwood East stations, and EastLink.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Renovated with Flair and Care
This neat 3 bedroom brick veneer home positioned amongst leafy surrounds on the border of Ringwood East, has in recent years undergone a well executed renovation. The home is favoured with high ceilings and rooms of surprisingly large proportions and the quality renovation has created an outstanding abode for a young family. Polished floorboards, timber blinds, ducted heating and evaporative cooling complement the flowing floorplan. There is an L-shaped living/dining room, open and bright kitchen with good storage and work spaces, and a meals/second living room leading out to a balcony and child friendly traditional large backyard. Both laundry and bathroom are sizeable and well finished, there are two bedrooms with BIRs and the main bedroom is serviced by ensuite and walk-in robe. Conveniently close to Ringwood East Station and shops, Tintern Girls Grammar, primary schools and parklands. An appealing home inviting inspection.
Brett Freeman

Description:
CONTEMPORARY ARCHITECT DESIGN
Situated in a prized pocket in the bowl of a quiet and leafy court, bordering Ringwood East, you will find this three bedroom BV, architect designed house which is situated on approximately 1000m2.The property is close to Tintern Girls Grammar, East Ringwood Station/shops and East Link.
With 80's inspired design this home has feature timber ceilings to most rooms, cathedral ceilings to the formal area, exposed brick walls, large picture windows and features such as door entry from the formal dining and lounge area to the outdoors. There is a bright and light open plan kitchen /meals area which looks over the extra large outdoor under cover entertaining area which has a built in BBQ.
Feature include brand new carpet and window coverings, brand new dishwasher, parquetry flooring, GDH, cooling, gas hot plates and electric wall oven. Other features include extra large ensuite and WIR to master bedroom, BIR's to bedroom 2 and 3, generous laundry, cedar storage shed and double car accommodation. The rear of the property is elevated and private, while the main patio covered area is generous and is very child friendly.
Ready for a new family this property awaits your inspection.

Description:
Packed With Possibilities
Appealing to first homebuyers, investors, developers and families, this potential packed property is situated in a charming pocket close to schools, shops, transport, walking tracks and reserves. Sitting on 881sqm (approx) and offering a bright, clean and exceptionally well maintained interior and exterior, this allotment offers bountiful opportunities, including, refreshing and extending, develop as a dual occupancy (STCA) or leave as is and enjoy. Two living zones include a separate light filled lounge room, plus a recently renovated kitchen, fully equipped with gas cooking appliances, dishwasher, bench space and cupboards galore, looking through to a sun drenched family room, providing a refreshing space for meals and relaxation. Glass doors open out to a tiered rear deck, covered entertaining area and a substantial backyard boasting three sheds, two water tanks and ample room to run and play. Providing three comfortable bedrooms, two with robes, a neat and tidy family bathroom, gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, immaculate carpets, tandem carport and even a spot to park the caravan or trailer.
With an offer full of possibility this property is sure to attract substantial interest, book your inspection today.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Home With A View
Serenely situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, this peacefully private abode (on approximately 910SQM) is set over an easy-care single level. The relaxed haven (offset by timber boards, neutral tones and natural light) possesses spacious interiors progressing to an alfresco entertaining quadrant; an expansive covered deck with a spa boasts extraordinary views of the Dandenong’s and adjacent parkland. At the heart of the home, a beautiful timber kitchen, equipped with stainless-steel appliances, easily services the casual meals/family and formal dining/lounge domains. Privately allocated, the bedrooms are serviced by a bright bathroom and built-in robes. The master also benefits from an ensuite. Adding to the home’s immense appeal, the location places it within walking distance of Eastfield Shops, schools and public transport. Features: gas ducted heating, split-system air-conditioning, water tank, double lock-up garage & downlights.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
DUAL ZONED LIVING
This property is a rare find, the main residence consists of four bedrooms, two bathrooms, two living areas, ducted heating, ducted cooling and much more. The self-contained area is of the same quality and under the same roof line and consists of one bedroom, a kitchen lounge area one toilet and a bathroom. The self-contained has both external and internal access. This is a very unique property suitable for an extended family or additional income. You don't often find a dual living property as well designed as this one, do not hesitate.

Description:
A First Homebuyers Dream
Barry Plant Croydon in Conjunction with Ian Reid's Vendor Advocacy are happy to bring you this delightfully maintained home, set within a whisper quiet court on the doorstep of a bushy reserve, with access to walking tracks and playgrounds but also within close proximity to shops, schools and transport. An absolute dream for first homebuyers as beautiful gum trees compliment a cute frontage with covered front balcony, large carport and an adjoining functional storage room. Natural light streams through big windows in this character split level home. Featuring quality slate flooring and new carpet throughout, a cathedral ceiling and brick open fire place with chimney create an atmosphere of warmth and space in the lounge room. The living zone extends to an inviting meals area, with views of the yard and a practical kitchen, equipped with a new gas stove/oven. Comprising three neat and tidy bedrooms, all with robes and an ensuite to the master, this homely residence is equipped with gas ducted heating, split system cooling and an immaculate bathroom. Lovely red brick paving features in an expansive level rear yard, complete with the charm of apple trees, an established herb garden and shed. Totally lovable, this comfortable home and tranquil location make for a calming impression! Contact Ben today on 0438 285 337 to inspect this lovely home.
Ben Chrimes : 0438 285 337

Address: 2 Woodland Park Rise Croydon South VIC 3136
Description:
A Wise Move
Make a family commitment with this striking double-storey residence in a convenient locale. As soon as you walk through the pillared entry, you are greeted by warm and expansive living domains. Flanked by the formal lounge and dining rooms, the tiled entry leads to the family, meals and kitchen. A phenomenal work area, the meal preparation zone is equipped with stainless-steel appliances. Plentiful windows provide unobscured views over low-maintenance landscaped gardens. Located on the upper floor, the sleeping quarters houses three generously proportioned bedrooms (with BIRs) serviced by a bathroom infused with natural light. A luxuriant retreat, the master bedroom boasts walk-in robes and a remarkable ensuite with a spa bath. Located in easy reach of Eastfield Shops, local schools and bus stops, this quality built home is an easy choice. Features: ample storage, gas-ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm system, double remote garage.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Peace & Quiet
Standing proudly at the rear of the block, this family-sized unit houses an exciting future. Offset by fresh tones, the impressive proportions of the functional floorplan include large lounge, dining and family rooms partially divided by feature walls. Overseeing the informal meals area, a striking modern kitchen possesses stainless-steel appliances. The living areas extend out to a paved courtyard bordered by vibrant plantation. Privately situated, the master bedroom has walk-in robes and a modern ensuite. The remaining bedrooms, serviced by a sleek bathroom, have built-in robes. Boasting all the mod cons, notable features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling & downlights. Situated in easy reach of parkland, local shops, bus stops, and a range of primary and secondary schools, this unit is just perfect for those starting out, scaling down or investing.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
The Ultimate Entertainer
Offering all aspects of the lifestyle you've dreamed of enjoying, this modern and chic abode combines a family friendly layout with retreat spaces for all to enjoy. Enhanced by contemporary architectural styling with angled ceilings, walls of glass and stunning polished floorboards, the home provides a unique feeling of effortless fun and relaxation and enjoys flawless family flexibility, catering for all seasons. Offering the distinct advantage of a light filled interior, this beautifully remodelled residence is filled with creative energy and provides ample bedroom accommodation with 5 rooms of generous size and enjoys a main bedroom with ensuite and adjoining air conditioned study/home office. Filled with a selection of impressive living options, the home is superbly appointed with a dedicated, sound proof home theatre room perfect for the blockbuster enthusiast (air conditioned), a relaxed family room enhanced by angled ceilings, a light-filled lounge room warmed by the blazing coals of the coonara wood heater, a sun soaked air conditioned meals area and a decadent Caesar stone kitchen highlighted by a Lofra double oven, high gloss cabinetry and a stand alone island bench perfect for family and friends to congregate. Boasting the ultimate outdoor dining experience, the home opens onto a most impressive covered entertainment deck that enjoys a built in wet bar with kitchen facilities, a coonara/cook top stove
and uninterrupted views that provide the perfect backdrop while entertaining with guests. Offering impeccable attention to detail, the home includes hardwood polished floors, gas ducted heating, security alarm, new paint, new carpet, designer bathroom amenities, outdoor feature lighting, a tandem garage with remote door, a double carport and a separate garage/workshed at the rear. Including a child friendly backyard with a cubby house and sand-pit, a water tank and a private allotment of 1,340sqm (approx), this contemporary masterpiece is located within walking distance to Tintern Girls Grammar, a choice of elite Primary schools, transport, sporting facilities and local shopping services. A must to see, call now!
Tim Treeby

Description:
Perfect for the First Home Buyer or Investor
Get in early and beat the rush to see this affordable family home. Positioned within a popular family location close to parkland, transport, Merrindale shops and elite schooling opportunities including Tintern Girls Grammar, this 3 bedroom home offers the opportunity to secure an investment in your financial future. Set on a spacious allotment that provides a large backyard for the kids to play, the home provides a roomy interior filled with 3 robed bedrooms (main with ensuite and built-in-robes), a large central bathroom with separate toilet and vanity, a family-friendly lounge room with gas wall heater and an air conditioned meals area/family room off the well-equipped kitchen. Offering an outdoor paved area that provides the perfect place to BBQ with friends, the home includes a garden shed and loads of potential to make it your own. Appealing to young families, investors or those who want room to grow, call now!

Description:
For Those Who Want It All
Superbly located within a premium position close to Belmont and Eastfield Parks, bike and walking trails, buses and local shopping facilities, this fabulous 3 bedroom home offers all the benefits of low maintenance living combined with stylish living options. Highlighted by a split level floorplan that delivers the latest features to enjoy a modern lifestyle, the home is complemented by an expansive, open plan family/meals/lounge room and is serviced by a delightful entertainer's kitchen that is feature packed with every modern amenity. Enjoying three robed bedrooms including a main bedroom with two way access to the ultra chic bathroom with spa bath, the home includes a large built-in linen press perfect as a study nook. Integrating perfectly to the outdoor entertaining deck ideal for intimate twilight dining or entertaining with friends, the home features a bubbling outdoor spa and a private backyard that offers a great outlook to Mt Dandenong. Spoilt by gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, high ceilings, a sun drenched interior and a LARGE double lock-up garage with remote door and workspace area, the home has been wired for surround sound and provides the perfect opportunity for busy professionals, first home buyers, empty nesters or young couples to enter the market. Be the envy of all your friends and inspect now!

Description:
The Whole Package
Beautifully presented inside and out, this lovely home distinctly emanates a warm atmosphere favourable to family living. The functional floorplan caters for formal and informal living requirements: an open-plan lounge and dining room leads through to a casual meals and family area overseen by a well-appointed kitchen. The sleeping quarters are divided so that the master (with ensuite and walk-in robe) is situated separately to the children’s bedrooms (with built-in robes) which are serviced by a bright bathroom. Entertaining and reclining extends to the great outdoors courtesy of an undercover BBQ area which oversees an alfresco dining domain bordered by vibrant gardens and a grassy play zone.
Sheltered behind a hedge fence in a secure neighbourhood, this family sanctuary is in walking distance of The Gateway Reserve and close to schools, shops and transport. Features: heating, cooling, double carport, garden shed.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Lovely Lodgings
The perfect place for families starting out or those looking to downsize, this well-presented option is definitely worth a look! Inside, neutral decor combines with a practical floorplan to create an easily-liveable environ. Taking pride of place at the forefront of the home, the master bedroom is luxuriantly sized and features a walk-in robe and ensuite. The remaining bedrooms both possess built-in robes. Boasting an island bench and stainless-steel appliances, the country-style kitchen (requiring some finishing touches) oversees a casual meals/family space. Separate to this, a formal lounge and dining room is a fantastic backdrop for entertaining. This extends out to a large, covered deck bordered by grassy gardens and fruit trees. Securely shaded from the street via a canopy of greenery, the home is in easy reach of The Gateway Reserve, Merrindale Shops and a variety of schools.
Features: gas log-fire-imitation heater, split-system air-conditioning, garden shed, double garage.

Address: 30A BELMONT ROAD WEST CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
LOVE AT FIRST SIGHT
30A BELMONT ROAD WEST, CROYDON SOUTH/CROYDON
It'll be love at first sight with this enchanting home that combines the best of Federation design with modern comforts to create a wonderful and low-maintenance lifestyle. Set peacefully at the rear of a subdivided block, its character filled interior boasts an inviting lounge with open fire & bar. A well appointed timber kitchen with adjoining family/meals area, warmed by Coonara, leading out to large entertaining deck and private courtyard garden. Two bedrooms plus bathroom are privately positioned on the ground level, while the master bedroom with WIR & ensuite indulges you with your own private retreat upstairs. Included are ducted heating, evaporative cooling and remote control double garage. Eastfield shops & Cheong Park, Tintern Girls Grammar, primary schools, transport and Eastlink are all within close proximity.
NOTE: Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections
